page.title: 10AN"OPEN PLAN"PRIMARY KLMRNCK
page.content: {GARGIESTON PRIMARY} BUILT IN 1975 IT WAS ONE OF MANY NEW SCHOOLS BUILT TO A SIMILAR DESIGN IN AYRSHIRE. IT HAS A CAPACITY FOR 231 PUPILS IN 8 TEACHING BASES GROUPED ROUND A CENTRAL WORK AREA.THE CORNER ROOMS ARE TRADITIONAL CLOSED ROOMS WITH A DOOR OPENING ON TO THIS AREA. FOUR ROOMS ARE OPEN HAVING NO WALL SEPARATING THEM FROM THE OPEN AREA.THERE IS ALONG THE CORRIDOR FROM THE MAIN TEACHING AREA 2 SMALLER TUTORIAL ROOMS,A GYMNASIUM AND A DINING AREA WHERE LUNCHES ARE SERVED. THIS DINING AREA,BEING AT A HIGHER LEVEL THAN THE GYM,ALSO SERVES AS A STAGE FOR SCHOOL CONCERTS.THE PLAYGROUND AREA IS MOSTLY GRASS WHICH INCLUDES A SOCCER PITCH.THERE IS A TARMACADAMED AREA WHICH SERVES BOTH AS A PLAY AREA AND A NETBALL PITCH.
